text: Lluís Homar i Toboso (born April 20, 1957) is a Spanish actor and theater director from Barcelona. (Spanish) He is known for his roles in Bad Education (2004) and Broken Embraces (2009). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish theatre directors Category:Actors from Barcelona
title: Lluís Homar
